EmailTemplate.subject: NCS with The Challenge - E-learning module
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. This email was sent from an unattended mailbox and replies are not reviewed. Please instead contact your Staffing representative. Dear {!Contact.FirstName}
We hope you are looking forward to a fantastic summer working on NCS with the Challenge.
We are very pleased to send you a link to the NCS E-learning module for your work on this year's NCS with The Challenge programme. The aim of this module is to give you a better understanding of the principles that underpin the ethos of NCS.
To access the E-learning module please click here. http://www.byglearning.co.uk/CAB-4016-LMS/Content/Login.aspx
If you have not worked on NCS with The Challenge before, please register with an email address and create a password, select the "Summer" programme from the drop down menu and select the local authority where you will be working.
If you completed the E-learning module last year, please login using your email and address and password. Click on the "Edit" Button, choose the "Programme" drop down menu and click "Summer". Then press "submit" and click "Launch programme".
When logging in to this, if you are not sure which borough to state, please put the borough that you originally applied for. For a full list of boroughs where we work, please go to http://www.ncsthechallenge.org/where-staff-can-work.
If you have any further questions about working with NCS with The Challenge, please contact your Staffing Associate.
Many thanks for your contribution to NCS. Best Wishes,
The Challenge
